thread.section_title: zChocolat Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of zChocolat | www.zchocolat.com | 4 of 19
thread.title: Constance Ellington

author: Constance Ellington
title: Constance Ellington
text:
I tell everyone I know that your chocolates are the best in the world, & I am an expert! I have traveled all over the world for many years & had the finest Swiss & Belgium chocolate among many others. No one compares to Z. No one.
The service from placing an order to delivery is seamless with constant notifications along the way letting you know the status of your order at all times. I cannot give anyone anywhere a higher rating in quality of product & service. I am a customer for life!!!
